function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of infectious viruses due to air recirculation in public buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne infection transmission and potential contamination of areas connected to the same ventilation system","Mitigation":"Avoid air recirculation, use particulate filters, and disinfection equipment in recirculated air streams","Technologies":"Particulate filters, disinfection equipment, and regular ventilation system maintenance","People":"Occupants of public buildings, particularly in cold climates","Owner":"Building maintenance and management teams"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of filters in removing small particles associated with adverse health effects","Impact":"Potential exposure to small, harmful particles that may affect health","Mitigation":"Utilize filters designed to remove small particles and follow industry standard ratings for filter performance","Technologies":"Particulate filters with appropriate ratings for particle size removal","People":"Occupants of public buildings, particularly in cold climates","Owner":"Building maintenance and management teams"}]}
